desc.en: London Overground (also known simply as the Overground) is a suburban rail network serving London and its environs. Established in 2007 to take over Silverlink Metro routes, it now serves a large part of Greater London as well as Hertfordshire, with 113 stations on the six lines that make up the network. In 2024, each of the six Overground lines were given distinct colours and names – Lioness, Mildmay, Windrush, Weaver, Suffragette, and Liberty – which are intended to reference London's diverse history and communities.
desc.zh-Hans: 伦敦地上铁（也简称为 Overground）是一条服务于伦敦及其周边地区的郊区铁路网络。它成立于 2007 年，接管了 Silverlink 地铁线路，目前服务于大伦敦大部分地区以及赫特福德郡，组成该网络的六条线路上有 113 个车站。2024 年，六条地上铁线路分别被赋予了不同的颜色和名称——Lioness、Mildmay、Windrush、Weaver、Suffragette 和 Liberty——旨在体现伦敦多元化的历史和社区。
